name: Dig to the Core
description:
If you want a good experience, please download the game. Using webgl will result in crap audio quality and you just wanna hit the mute button real fast. It's for your own good, trust me.  

Update: I fixed a bug where people with low resolution weren't able to play the game. I hope it was allowed...

Once upon a time there was a miner. One day he wanted to mine down to the core of the earth.  You are the miner.

Mine ores and dirt in an epic world of dirt. Buy new shovels so you can mine better ores and discover the secrets of the earth. Get new friends, face your fears and have fun! (second last sentence not guaranteed)

Controls: Arrow keys.

Made for Ludum Dare 48

Theme: Deeper and deeper
